TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemPens extends System.Object

summary.span: 类的每个属性都是一个 ，它是 Windows 显示元素的颜色，宽度为 1 个像素。

span.span: Each property of the class is a that is the color of a Windows display element and that has a width of 1 pixel.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建点和使用多个重载的运算符定义为这些类型的大小。The following code example creates points and sizes using several of the overloaded operators defined for these types. 它还演示如何使用类。It also demonstrates how to use the class. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建一个包含窗体名为`subtractButton`。Create a form that contains a named `subtractButton`. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`CreatePointsAndSizes`方法从窗体的`Paint`事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into the form and call the `CreatePointsAndSizes` method from the form's `Paint` event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取表示选定项背景颜色的 。

span.span: Gets a that is the color of the background of selected items.

value.span: 一个 ，它是选定项的背景的颜色。

span.span: A that is the color of the background of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所选的项目可能包含菜单项，以及所选的文本。Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text. 例如，该钢笔可以是用于在列表框中的选定项的背景的颜色。For example, the pen may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建点和使用多个重载的运算符定义为这些类型的大小。The following code example creates points and sizes using several of the overloaded operators defined for these types. 它还演示如何使用属性。It also demonstrates how to use the property. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建一个包含窗体名为`subtractButton`。Create a form that contains a named `subtractButton`. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`CreatePointsAndSizes`方法从窗体的事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into the form and call the `CreatePointsAndSizes` method from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes/VB/form1.vb#1)]
